quote_first: You left the main hospital building at about midnight. You spoke to the porter at the main gate at
quote_last: Where were you between those times?
quote_raw: You left the main hospital building at about midnight. You spoke to the porter at the main gate at twelve thirty-eight a.m. Where were you between those times?
title: Shroud for a Nightingale
author: P.D. James

quote_first: Somewhere he'd lost three days; for he'd entered the burning veil Thursday,
quote_last: . Yes. But keep cool. There's more at stake than three lost days. There must be; otherwise why the police?
quote_raw: Somewhere he'd lost three days; for he'd entered the burning veil Thursday, thirty-eight minutes past midnight. Yes. But keep cool. There's more at stake than three lost days. There must be; otherwise why the police?
title: Redemolished
author: Alfred Bester

quote_first: Justin turned on the light and groggily looked at the Sony clock radio which said it was
quote_last: The screams in his dream had been painfully, frighteningly real, but he could not remember where the screams had come from.
quote_raw: Justin turned on the light and groggily looked at the Sony clock radio which said it was 12:38 a.m. The screams in his dream had been painfully, frighteningly real, but he could not remember where the screams had come from.
title: Crow's Nest
author: G.V. Miller
